definition: to fill a job vacancy/to fill in a blank (e.g. on questionnaire or exam paper)
to fill or stuff/(of a form etc) to fill in

sentences.english: A Complete these sentences using a or an.
sentences.chinese: 完成以下句子，用冠詞a或an填空。

sentences.english: Please fill in the blanks in the sentence.
I really dislike doing grammar and tense related english fill-in questions.
sentences.chinese: 我很討厭做關於語法和時態轉換的英語填空題。

sentences.english: He filled in the blanks in the sentences to set aside the useful ones.
sentences.chinese: 他在句子裏填空來挑出有用的證據。
新增以短文爲基礎的填空題。

sentences.english: Fill the blanks in there sentences, then write them neatly.
sentences.chinese: 給些句子填空，然後工整地抄寫下來。

sentences.english: Fill in the blanks dawn articles where (it is) whispered.
sentences.chinese: 在必要的地方用冠詞填空。

sentences.english: 2b Listen again and fill in theblanks in the chart.
sentences.chinese: 再聽一遍，在表格中填空。

sentences.english: Look at the picture and fill in the blanks.
sentences.chinese: 看圖選詞完成填空，描述給你的同桌聽。

sentences.english: Complete the following paragraph according to the text.
Cloze is to test the students' comprehensive abilities.
sentences.chinese: 完形填空題是一種測試綜合能力的題型。

sentences.english: Put the verbs in brackets /into/ the correct tense.
sentences.chinese: 用括號裏動詞的正確形式填空。

sentences.english: Fill the blank spaces with right words.
Fill the blanks with articles where (it is) necessary.
sentences.chinese: 在必要的地方用冠詞填空。

sentences.english: Ten dollars is a small sum.
sentences.chinese: 十美元是初二英語完形填空個小數目。

sentences.english: But success is measured in so much more than just scantron bubbles and fill-in-the-blank questions.
sentences.chinese: 但是，衡量成功的標準卻是鋪天蓋地的選擇填空題。

definition: topic/problem for discussion/exam question/subject/to inscribe/to mention/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]
part of speech (noun, verb, adjective etc)/lexical category
problem or question solved for illustrative purposes in the classroom/practice question (used in preparation for an exam)/sample question
(of a pupil) to write down (in a dictation exercise)/dictation/(music) to transcribe by ear
